thread.title: Not a family friendly hotel
thread.title_full: Not a family friendly hotel - Review of Premier Inn London Hanger Lane Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Maria O
title: Not a family friendly hotel
text: The overall hotel was good, the food was nice the room was comfortable and we slept well until we came back to our room on the 16/03/17 after breakfast and found a member of staff in our room. This gentleman was not house keeping and he had the door locked from the inside. He seemed shocked to see us and made up some spurious excuse to us. He asked us to come to reception, then he said he made a mistake and offered us a box of sweets in compensation. Not a good experience for families be careful here.
